title: The All-Star Pick 10 Results Are In!

replies.body: This community fucking sucks at picking champions

I can't help but feel like it would have been better if they went to the second pick for any doubles. Lee Sin + Thresh can make for some exciting plays for sure but a little more diversity would go a long way.

What a bummer.
{{champion:64}} +{{champion:412}} +{{champion:236}} VS {{champion:64}} +{{champion:412}} +{{champion:236}}
Wait a min {{champion:412}}  stole {{champion:236}} 's wife
Damn straight, the woman was getting in the way of their love.
This pick 10 just wow. I honestly can't believe these are the results of the community.
You really can't believe it? Clearly you've never met the community before.
^I was hoping for some Sion or Urgot or Poppy

I voted for rare champions. I'm shocked Brand isn't on team FIRE, but Thresh, Lucian and Lee Sin are on both teams.

Oh, and don't forget. Ezreal was picked for the Hexakill AND for this mode too.

It all starts looking kinda lame now. I don't wanna see Thresh for the millionth time, god...
I know right? I didn't pick ANY of the mainly used champs. {{champion:83}} {{item:3070}}

Yeah, this is pretty bad. I wanted to choose something i actually would enjoy watching. Like i picked sucky champs so i could see them struggle but none of them got picked what the heck but really mirrors? i hate mirrors ;-; big let down.
This is because our lovely community is made up of mostly silver and bronze...oh and dont forget wood league..hence the picks {{champion:35}}
i voted for rumble
This was a chance to pick really unique champs that are never played, not to make them play the same shit they already play lol.
What boring teams :(
Yay, Lee Sin, Thresh, and Lucian on both sides. This will be a very fun and interesting match to watch. /sarcasm
Who else picked the weakest out of meta champions? ex:urgot

Wow, this is largely disappointing. Get to watch the same boring drivel as the rest of the LCS. 

The only solace I can take is neither team has renekton or nidalee.
"should we put these 3 op over played champions on team fire or ice?"-riot. "Y not both" - Community
{{champion:17}}  I demand a recount!
How do I downvote this thread, these champ picks are so fucking meta it hurts. only cool one is going to be Anivia ;).
Except for Anivia and Zed, BOOOOORING! Is that really all you could think of!?
Great, more champions that aren't already spammed the fuck out of in solo queue and LCS. Some matches I definitely **WON'T** be watching!

...I'm so ashamed of this community. With ultimate power in our grasps', what do we do? Do we watch a pro game where one team has all 4 of the game's infinitely scaling champions? Do we make a pro game with one team all AD and the other all AP? Do we use *interesting* champions? No, we put a {{champion:412}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:236}} on each team. ...*sigh* Well, at least the team comps are kinda weird.
Wow! Such unique picks! I rarely see them played! /s
This is boring and disappointing.  Only "interesting" one is anivia. :/

Lucian, Lee Sin, and Thresh on both teams......

I had kinda hoped that the champs chosen had been ones rarely seen like Urgot or Galio.

"...two dream teams by choosing one champion for each role on each team for a total of ten unique champions."

"...ten unique champions."

"...UNIQUE..."

You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means.
Would have loved to see some different champions!
Why? Who picked theses people? I'm watching you.......... {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}}
Eye am not {{champion:64}}

Well, Riot will probably never give us another chance to pick teams because of the sheer amount of sheep that pick the stupidest and most boring overplayed champions we see nearly every single LCS game. Rito next time come up with preset team comps and have us pick from those so we actually get interesting teams...
LOL make bjergsen play the one champ he hates to play. he says it every stream yet the community is gonna force him to play it
The teams should have all just picked "Random."
How scrub can the community be, 3 of the same champions on both sides?

Ugh... I was hoping for like team ice to have ice champions (e.g. Lissandra, Ashe, Trundle, Nunu, and Anivia) and team fire to have fiery champions (e.g. Annie, Brand, Shyvanna, Ziggs, and Rumble). I don't even want to watch this match because of the compositions.
I don't know about u guys, but i gave each team comps comprised entirely of yordles
Wellp....i tried to get some uncmmon picks like mord and urgot...guess everyone else wanted to see the same champions we see every week anyway
Just lost ALL interest in this AllStar event.
I DEMANDED {{champion:83}} AND WHAT I GOT WAS A BROKEN {{item:3110}}
" We asked you to build not one but two dream teams". it's official, riot also made twitch plays pokemon
I wish people pick more underused champions, I think it would make the game more exciting. {{champion:83}}

so, reading the comments, it doesn't look like ANYONE is happy with these picks... my question... "HOW the hell did these get picked???" I want a complete list of all summoner names that voted for these champions, and a street address //kidding about the list//
I hate life so much right now. Worst. Picks. Ever.
Much variety such- *snores*
When will we get our URF back?
yay variation!!
